meanings.sent1: The water bottle is spillable if not closed properly.
meanings.sent2: Be careful with the spillable cup of coffee.
meanings.sent3: The spillable juice made a colorful mess on the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her spillable secrets flowed out during the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The spillable paint created a beautiful pattern on the canvas.

meanings.sent1: The full glass was spillable as it teetered on the edge.
meanings.sent2: The spillable soup sloshed in the container.
meanings.sent3: The spillable milk carton seemed to mock his attempts to pour without spilling.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were spillable, ready to overflow at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The spillable bucket of water threatened to soak everything nearby.
